name: Calques Collector (2021)
description:
Through a 2D video game, we will take you on a journey inside the 110-year-old French Consulate building in Alexandria, Egypt , in an attempt to trace the legacy of the French designer Jean Royère.

This work is a collaboration between Kerim Mounir and Moira Ali.

On the 4th of June 2021 the game was exhibited as a part of Replay Royère exhibition, a collective exhibition held  in Shelter art Space in partnership with The French consulate in Alexandria

Artwork by:
Moira Ali

Designed and Created by:
Kerim Mounir

Gameplay Music by:
Mahmoud Tareq

Credits scene Music by:
Kerim Mounir

Special thanks to:
French consulate in Alexandria, Egypt
Wishforge Games
GDevelop Community
